snippet: The Agriculture Department on Tuesday revised upward its estimate of this year’s corn crop to 14 billion bushels.
lead_paragraph: The Agriculture Department on Tuesday revised upward its estimate of this year’s corn crop to 14 billion bushels.

headline.main: Record U.S. Yields Expected in Corn and Soybeans
headline.print_headline: Record U.S. Yields Expected In Corn and Soybeans
